Series

  1. Drag a Program selection from the Programs Sidebar onto the Show Schedule.

  2. Using the Series mode, select/de-select Episodes on the ordered list of Program Episodes.

  3. Using a scheduling mode that repeats (e.g. daily, weeeekly, etc), add a show that cycles through the Program Episodes in each successive timeslot.
  4. Use the Repeat option to restart from the first selected Episode if the number of available timeslots exceeds the number of Program Episodes.
Documentation for Program Manager
